#Easy
$$
\\y_i \sim  Normal(\mu_i, \sigma)
\\\mu_i \sim \alpha_{GROUP[i]} \> + \> \beta_{GROUP[i]} x_i
\\\alpha_{GROUP} \sim Normal(\alpha, \>\sigma_a)
\\\alpha \sim Normal(0, 10)
\\\beta \sim Normal(0, 1)
\\\sigma \sim HalfCauchy(0, 2)
\\\sigma_a \sim HalfCauchy(0, 2)
$$
